text: The Royal ghost frog (Heleophryne regis) is a species of frog in the Heleophrynidae family. It is endemic to South Africa. Its natural habitats are temperate forests, Mediterranean-type shrubby vegetation, and rivers. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Minter, L., Channing, A. & Harrison, J. 2004. Heleophryne regis . 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 July 2007. Category:South Africa Category:Frogs of Africa
title: Royal ghost frog
